sentences.en: As soon as the crowd starts to fidget change the music.
sentences.cn: 一旦人群开始出现厌烦情绪,就改变曲目.

sentences.en: Be still and don't fidget about!
Children with ADHD - mostly boys - constantly fidget and struggle to concentrate.
sentences.cn: 患有多动症(ADHD) 的儿童(大多是男孩)经常感到坐立不安并且很难去集中.

sentences.en: Fidget with small objects when talking, indicating nervousness or boredom.
sentences.cn: 与人交谈摆弄小物件显得心不在焉, 表示你神经过敏或厌倦.

sentences.en: He likes to fidget with computers.
It annoys me when you fidget!
sentences.cn: 你一坐立不安,我就觉得厌烦!

sentences.en: It's bad manners to fidget about at the table.
sentences.cn: 用餐时摆弄刀叉玩儿是不雅的.

sentences.en: Presently he began to fidget on his seat.
sentences.cn: 接着他就坐立不安起来.

sentences.en: Romeo's father: Don't you feel fidget? should we go on acting? We are leading roles!
sentences.cn: 罗父: 烦不烦啊? 还演不演啊? 我们才是主角啊!
坐着别动, 你这坐不定的小东西!

sentences.en: Some people stare at their screen and fidget.
sentences.cn: 有些人盯住屏幕,坐立不安.

sentences.en: The kids had started to fidget.
sentences.cn: 孩子们开始坐立不安起来。

words.tran_cn: 不安的，烦躁的；难以取悦的
烦躁；坐立不安；烦躁不安的人

trans.tran_cn: 坐立不安的人（尤指儿童），（一阵）心烦意乱
坐立不安, 烦躁, 慌张, (不安地或心不在焉地)弄, 玩弄
trans.tran_en: to keep moving your hands or feet, especially because you are bored or nervous
